EmailTemplate.name: Event - Update Special Invite - Netherlands.Email - Invite 1 - Marketo Format
EmailTemplate.subject: Tosca Update Special 2015 – Utrecht, Netherlands
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Utrecht, Netherlands – June 25th, 2015
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Sign up today for the Tosca Update Special in Utrecht on June 25th, 2015 and find out all about the latest Tosca Testsuite product features and integrations.
Join us to learn more about the new Image-based Test Automation, Test Case Design Relations, Tosca Control Flow, Loops & Conditions, Orchestrated Service Virtualization, and many more topics. Everything will be shown during live demos in Tosca Testsuite’s latest version 8.4. The Tricentis Management Team will also be available to answer all of your questions personally.
We look forward to introducing you to all of the new features in Tosca Testsuite 8.4!
Agenda: 13:00 – 13:30 Registration & Welcome 13:30 – 15:00 New Features & Demo – Part 1 15:00 – 15:30 Coffee Break 15:30 – 16:45 New Features & Demo – Part 2 16:45 – 17:00 Summary and Q&A After: Join us after the presentations for a time to discuss and network!
<http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/update-special-2015-2015-06-25?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
Update Special – Utrecht June 25th, 2015, 1:00 – 5:00 p.m. Jaarbeurs Supernova – Room Expedition Jaarbeursplein 3521 AL Utrecht
We look forward to seeing you there!
Best Regards, The Tricentis Events Team
